Как правило, все со временем стареет. НО в КС есть 2 момента, которые никогда не постареют: баннихоп, и серфинг... (возможно -что -то забыл) Замечательный движок, сделавший в свое время революцию в игроиндустрии, гибкий на столько, что умельцы создают аж шедевры совешенно другого жанра и стиля, и все на базе КС - то бишь движка сурс...
9 из 10! удачи вам!

Solo he jugado menos de 2 horas pero he podido ver que es un buen juego c:, buenos graficos para el año en que salio, buena jugabilidad, y buenos modos de juego, pero tambien hay varias cosas que no me gustaron del juego, como que ya no hay tantos servers, no hay tantos modos de juego y que tiene un precio excesivo ($170 PESOS WTF!)
Pero bueno, es buen juego si no tienes una pc tan potente y si quieres jugar unos de los clasicos de Valve c:
Jogo muito para aprender a jogar cs
While many are stuck in CS-GO being miserable i was able to find this lost treasure. Buy this game and do zombie runs all day while you drink IPAs. life cant get better.

Tout dans la simplicité et la fluidité. C'est la base du fps, J'ai beau chercher, je ne trouverai jamais un fps mieux que ce jeu. Et dire qu'il est sortie il y a déjà pas mal d'années.. mais il ne viellit pas. EPIQUE ET MYTHIQUE

just be careful xD

Gayet güzel bir oyun...İndirimde almıştım ucuza gelmişti.Parasını sonuna kadar hak eden bir oyun ancak CS:GO Gibi rütbe, lobi sistemi olsaydı CS:GO yerine bunu oynayabilirdim.Gerçekten harika...CS:GO'yu oynayamayanlar silver olanlar vs. varsa tam onlara uygun bir oyun çünkü spray sistemi çook kolay ve HS atmakta bir o kadar kolay.

I don't play this game as often as I used to, but its still fun to play. Hell, the only reason i bought it back in 2010 was because I wanted textures so I could finally see people in DarkRP and not have to shoot errors all day. But after I started playing it I found out how fun it was. Always fun to drop in to servers, especially with all the drama that can happen on them. Community is wayyyyyyyy better than CS:GO and definatly more fun to talk to. Plus, the physics engine hasn't been fucked over like they did in CS:GO. It does suck that a lot of servers have died. I miss the days where fy_icyworld and cs_crackhouse were always full and on deathmatch gamemode. If you have a feeling for nostalgia and want to find a fun, entertaining game just like CS:GO, play this one!
I love this game. It's much better than CS:GO. It is exciting and heart racing.

Vraiment un très bon jeu, plein de modes, petits regrets d'une communauté qui part sur Counter Strike: Global Offensive.
Accessible à tous, pas besoin d'une très grosse config, 4GO de RAM amplement suffisant !
Great game ... I like to play zombie escape and some classic ... what can I say ... gr8

Как через дым в хэд?! ВХ, АИМ!!!", не слушали дапчик в конце каждого раунда.
